title: Where is God When Your Marriage Hits the Bottom?
itunes:author: Guests: Dave & Kirsten Samuel
itunes:summary:
Even when your marriage hits rock bottom, God will never leave you. John, Greg and Erin provide encouragement to couples who feel like there is no hope for their relationship. Featuring David and Kirsten Samuel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Kirsten Samuel's book "Choosing a Way Out" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-11-23?refcd=1328305

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/where-is-god-when-your-marriage-hits-the-bottom/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/loving-your-spouse-through-the-seasons-of-marriage-digital?refcd=1314706

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
